column4: whenever i do grub setup, italways installs to hd0,7. although my root is now not located on that partition. why is that?
whenever i do grub setup, italways installs to hd0,7. although my root is now not located on that partition. why is that? anybody?
change your grub root from the grub command prompt
i did. i used root (hd0,2) setup (hd0),it still installs as (hd0,7)
